verses.verse: Then answered<WH6030> Bildad<WH1085> the Shuhite,<WH7747> and said,<WH559>
Dominion<WH4910> and fear<WH6343> are with him, he makes<WH6213> peace<WH7965> in his high<WH4791> places.
Is there any number<WH4557> of his armies?<WH1416> and on whom<WH4310> does not his light<WH216> arise?<WH6965>
How<WH4100> then can man<WH582> be justified<WH6663> with God?<WH410> or how<WH637> can he be clean<WH2135> that is born<WH3205> of a woman?<WH802>
Behold<WH2005> even to the moon,<WH3394> and it shines<WH166> not; yes, the stars<WH3556> are not pure<WH2141> in his sight.<WH5869>
How<WH4100> much<WH637> less man,<WH582> that is a worm?<WH7415> and the son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> which is a worm?<WH8438>
